snippet.title: Dstroy - (1997) - Intros + Menu + Credits
snippet.description:
Remember - It's between 1995 and 1997: Are you still on Ms Dos? Maybe you unfortunately switched to the (terrible) Win95, like many? Intel Pentiums are reaching up to 133 or 200 MHz, and You probably have the mischance to own a Sound Blaster card instead of a fantastic Gravis Ultrasound. One day, you (maybe) discovered Dstroy... the (back then) best Bomberman-Like game on PC... Lucky you!

It took us many years to configure and learn properly DosBox with the Gravis Ultrasound emulation, OBS, and place all this to our Youtube channel, but here it is!
A first video to remember what it was like to Launch the game, watch the intros, listen to the main menu's music, and of course, quiting the game to enjoy the awesome credits and its "Utopic dreams" music (If you reading them, please be merciful, we were young geeks, and not very smart back then... ;).

Musics by Jerome Angelot: https://soundcloud.com/jerome-angelot
You can find all Dstroy's musics here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRPnyG742soucre6fCetGiB0BvYO87HvR
Play Dstroy on your browser: https://archive.org/details/msdos_Dstroy_1995
---------------------------------------------
http://www.fullybugged.com
